name: How to Date a Non-Terrian Person
name_original: How to Date a Non-Terrian Person
description:
WELCOME TO THE NEXT GEN DATING SIMULATOR

Here, you can find your true soulmate, by searching not only in your town,
but in the entire galaxy. Yes, now you can date a non-terrian person,
from a different planet !

Let's jump on this brand new (and first) prototype !

Happy date,

ROBIN & CHARLY

____________________

CREDITS :

Screenplay - Charly Akakpo / Robin Deriaud / Louise Rubi
Game Design & Graphics : Robin Deriaud
Music : Charly Akakpo
